ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lvl 52 song
ygData.msgSnippet: If I m using weapons, then given that Shield of Songs doesn t stack with the Breath of Harmony effect (Niv s), and that I can usually keep five buffs up full
ygData.messageBody:
If I'm using weapons, then given that Shield of Songs doesn't stack with the Breath of Harmony effect
(Niv's), and that I can usually keep five buffs up full time if I'm using the BoH, I use Wee instead of
SoS. Although I would agree that SoS is better straight up. Now that I hit 57, I may be retiring Wee,
though.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk


Adam Wasserman wrote:

> given shield of songs, I find march of the wee to be completely useless.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]

>
> Nillipuss's March of the Wee
>

> you will lose the effects as soon as you get hit. Or am I missing
> something?
>
> Is there only one lvl 52 song?
>
> Elfson Allegro 51 (almost 52) Veeshan
